name: Jump More, Jump Higher!
description:
Less is More.

The less jumps you have, the higher you jump!

I was trying to make the game feel a bit like Portal.

There are a few hidden secrets.

all textures are 8x8 or less.

This is my first game jam.

Sometimes the mobile build will break, I don't know why.

Play with sound!

I made all the assets. 

Made For The BTP Game Jam #3
